Context: George Brown College is committed to providing equal access and opportunity to education for students. The college offers support services and initiatives to achieve an inclusive and accessible community, in compliance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA). Some of the ways GBC meets these standards include offering service disruption notifications and welcoming feedback regarding accessibility concerns. George Brown College's accessibility policies provide guidance on achieving barrier-free access for persons with disabilities who are working, learning or visiting at the college. The AODA became law on June 13, 2005, and the Customer Service Standards came into effect on January 1, 2008. For accessibility concerns or inquiries, please contact security at 416-415-4000 or aoda@georgebrown.ca.
